text.summary: Explore a perilous site to advance deeper.
text.trigger: When you traverse a perilous site in search of objectives, roll to delve.

outcomes.strongHit: You make good progress and avoid new dangers. Mark progress according to the site rank.
outcomes.weakHit: You mark progress but encounter a complication or danger.
outcomes.miss: You are waylaid by a peril or discover a new threat. Pay the price.

text.summary: A fortunate event or helpful discovery is revealed.
text.trigger: When an opportunity is revealed within a site, envision it and take an appropriate bonus.

outcomes.strongHit: You capitalize on the moment. Choose an immediate benefit such as +1 momentum or progress.
outcomes.weakHit: The opportunity comes with a cost or complication. Gain a benefit but also a new threat.
outcomes.miss: The supposed opportunity was a trap or distraction. Face a new peril.

text.summary: Flee or withdraw from a perilous site.
text.trigger: When you attempt to escape a site and get to safety, roll your progress.

outcomes.strongHit: You get out quickly or avoid pursuit. You and any allies are safe.
outcomes.weakHit: You escape but the situation remains tense or you leave something behind.
outcomes.miss: You are pursued, trapped, or face a new calamity within the depths.
